thread.title: Candy Crush creator King Digital profit falls 28 pct
thread.title_full: Candy Crush creator King Digital profit falls 28 pct | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Candy Crush creator King Digital profit falls 28 pct
text:
Aug 13 King Digital Entertainment Plc, the creator of Candy Crush Saga, reported a 28 percent fall in quarterly profit as monthly unique users fell slightly and a strong dollar dented sales from outside the United States.
Net income fell to $119.3 million, or 38 cents per share, in the second quarter ended June 30 from $165.4 million, or 52 cents per share, a year earlier.
Revenue fell 17.5 percent to $489.5 million.
(Reporting by Devika Krishna Kumar in Bengaluru; Editing by Sayantani Ghosh)
